sections.Biography:
===[[Season 2]]===
He is part of [[Robb Stark]]'s army fighting in [[the Riverlands]]. He is present when Robb reads his peace terms to the captive [[Alton Lannister]].<ref>"[[The North Remembers]]"</ref>
